alert.note: Alert for Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 5:28PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...AREAS OF BRIEF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL BIG HORN AND CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 521 PM MST, areas of heavy snow and blowing snow were moving southward across portions of I-90 from south of Lodge Grass in Montana to the Sheridan vicinity in Wyoming. Motorists along I-90 in this area should be prepared for sudden drastic reductions in visibility, less than a quarter of a mile, along with slick or slushy roadways. These conditions may continue through at least 8 pm this evening. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Dayton, Big Horn, Wyola, Parkman, Banner, Story and Ucross. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or slush covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling this evening.
